Harry Richman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harry_Richman 0 Harry Richman (born Henry Reichman Jr., August 10, 1895 – November 3, 1972) was an American entertainer. He was a singer, actor, dancer, comedian, pianist, songwriter, bandleader, and night club performer, at his most popular in the 1920s and 1930s. Harry Richman ( born_Henry_Reichman_Jr. , August_10_,_1895 – November_3_,_1972 ) was an_American_entertainer . He was a_singer_,_actor_,_dancer_,_comedian_,_pianist_,_songwriter_,_bandleader , and night_club_performer , at his_most_popular in the_1920s_and_1930s .
